resources.string:
Our strong bands shall ne'er be broken, formed in ole' Phi Psi, far surpassing wealth unspoken, sealed by friendship's tie.

Amici usque ad aras deep graven on each heart, shall be found unwav'ring true when we from life shall part.

College life at best is passing, gliding swiftly by; Then let us pledge, in word and action, love for old Phi Psi.

Amici usque ad aras deep graven on each heart, shall be found unwav'ring true when we from life shall part.

When we sing our life's last measure, sweetest then shall be, strains recalling ev'ry treasure, of fraternity.

Amici usque ad aras deep graven on each heart, shall be found unwav'ring true when we from life shall part.

Noble Fraternity, Phi Kappa Psi, Thy loyal sons would lift thy banner on high; Brave may we ever be, in all life\'s fiercest battles, bearing the glorious shield of Phi Kappa Psi!\n\nSweet bond of unity, Phi Kappa Psi, Thy cherished memory in us ne\'er shall die; Joy of our college days, we\'ll never tire of giving three cheers and High! High! High! for Phi Kappa Psi!
The Phi Kappa Psi Coat of Arms
